title: soratun configuration schema
description: Configuration schema for `soratun`, SORACOM Arc client (default file name `arc.json`). You can manually edit any properties, but inconsistent modification might be resulted in connection failure. Use `soratun bootstrap` command as possible as you can to update the configuration.

privateKey.description: WireGuard private key. Do not modify this unless you know what you are doing

publicKey.description: WireGuard public key. Do not modify this unless you know what you are doing

simId.description: SIM ID of your virtual SIM

enableMetrics.description: Enable metrics logging every 60 seconds, if logLevel is error (1) or verbose (2)

interface.description: Interface name. if you are testing on macOS, the interface name must be "utun[0-9]+" for an explicit interface name, or just "utun" to have the kernel select the lowest available number.

additionalAllowedIPs.description: Array of additional WireGuard allowed CIDRs

persistentKeepalive.description: WireGuard `PersistentKeepalive` for the SORACOM Arc server

postUp.description: Array of shell scripts after the interface is up successfully. A script should be in the form `["executable", "param1", "param2"]`. The special string `%i` is expanded to interface name. The commands are executed in order. For example: `"postUp": [ [ "/bin/echo", "postUp", "%i" ], [ "echo", "%i" ] ]`

postDown.description: Array of shell scripts after the interface is removed successfully. A script should be in the form `["executable", "param1", "param2"]`. The special string `%i` is expanded to interface name. The commands are executed in order. For example: `"postDown": [ [ "/bin/echo", "postUp", "%i" ], [ "echo", "%i" ] ]`

endpoint.description: SORACOM API endpoint. Global coverage: https://g.api.soracom.io / Japan coverage: https://api.soracom.io

profile.description: SORACOM API client information. Saved if you use `soratun bootstrap authkey` command. Other bootstrap methods don't use this.

arcServerPeerPublicKey.description: WireGuard public key of the SORACOM Arc server

arcServerEndpoint.description: A UDP endpoint of the SORACOM Arc server in `ip or hostname:port` format

arcClientPeerIpAddress.description: An IP address for this client

arcAllowedIPs.description: An array of CIDRs allowed for routing from the SORACOM Arc server

arcSessionStatus.description: SORACOM Arc connection information. Usually you should not edit this property manually.
